entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Slave Lake Airport 7:45 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.5°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -19.6°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
